name: Alpha and Clones
description:
Alpha and Clones - Quilled

This game was made for the ScoreSpace Jam #16

The game uses an offline leaderboard.

If experiencing lag avoid using fullscreen.

Controls - WASD or ARROW KEYS to move. Left click to fire.

You are the white arrow (the alpha). Picking up the purple +1's create a clone of yourself. Enemies spawn throughout the arena and try to shoot you. If your clone gets hit then your clone will be eliminated, but if the alpha gets hit then all the clones will be eliminated and that will be the end of the game. Good luck and have fun!

Assets used:

Music: "Castle Of Fear" by David Renda

Bfxr for sound effects

Font: Arcadepix by Reekee of Dimenzioned

Created with Godot Engine
